text: Yalli Qhiyaamah ayró qadli miidanwa oobisna seehadâ taama teetil miidaanisnamkeh iyye, tokkel too ayro hebeltô nafsi tul mayandulluma ken taamak kardal (masangaleh caxah cabbat kinnuk) cabbatih gide Qilsak lem takke way tet bahnah ken elle galatnuh, nanu Ni naqoosah taamah fokkaaqoo kee cisab dudnaah diggi hayna
